attributes.additional_details:
Google has been disregarding our country's privacy laws for many years now. Why has the government taken no action to stop the tracking or limited the tracking of Google users. It is very dangerous for a company to collect so much information about people and the company not have any accountability to those people. The government need to discuss why Google has a free reign to do what they like and why they are ignoring our privacy laws.
The government also need to look at why there is almost a 100% biased media coverage of Google, while other search engines like Bing, Excite and British ones like Ehalos hardly get any coverage.
